</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Remote Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Disables unit's AV terminal(s) connecting to UAV. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object [[disableUAVConnectability]] [uav, checkAllItems] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> uav: [[Object]] or [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> checkAllItems: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to disable all terminals in unit's inventory, [[false]] to only disable the currently assigned terminal. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myUnit [[disableUAVConnectability]] [myUav, [[true]]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[isUAVConnectable]], [[enableUAVConnectability]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on September 15, 2018 - 20:13 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:PingWing|PingWing]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This command has effect on a UAV terminal, not on whether a unit is able to connect to a UAV or not.<br>
When a unit gets a new UAV terminal, the unit will be able to connect to the UAV again, unless this command is executed again.
</dd>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
